column2: film=[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)

column1: '''Bret McKenzie''' is a New Zealand actor and musician, best known as half of the entertainment duo ''[[wikipedia:Flight of the Conchords
column2: Flight of the Conchords]]''. He is the son of actor [[Peter McKenzie]].

column1: McKenzie gathered a huge web following for his tiny role as a background character in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings (film series)'']], later dubbed "[[Figwit]]". He portrayed [[Lindir]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)
column3: ''The Hobbit (film series)'']]. He also wrote and performed the song "[[Frodo, Don't Wear the Ring]]" with ''Flight of the Conchords''.

column1: * [[2001]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'': [[Figwit]]
* [[2003]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'': Figwit (labelled as ''Aegnor, Elven escort'')
